Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' compared to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' after a 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurrences before 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all reviewer-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Declined' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in relation to the total number of review cycles
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Review Cycle'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' per manuscript submission
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' leading to 'SW-EIC Major Revision' decisions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' before 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' followed by 'Assign a Different Editor'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in manuscripts that exceed the average review time
Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in the context of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activity
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' in relation to 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' followed by a 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' for the same manuscript
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities grouped by the last value of code filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' leading to a 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit' decision
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity == 'SW-Reviewer Declined'"}"
